name: RevolVR 3
description:
• RevolVR 2 was played by 3 million people in 78 VR parks around the world
  • Now you can experience RevolVR 3 in the comfort of your own very home

SOCIAL MEDIA

  • Discord has in-depth design posts and fan discussions.
  • Twitter features making-of materials, gags and jokes.
  • Instagram mainly contains concept art and such.
  • Website has press materials and contacts.
